name: Shopper Bug
description:
In Shopper Bug you must buy all the items on your shopping list and avoid catching the virus from anyone else. You don't know who might have it so you should keep your distance! Abiding by social distancing rules will serve you well.

You can catch the virus by walking directly past someone or from a surface when picking up an item. You can also pass the virus on to other surfaces and could infect others.

Use the WASD keys to move. Once you have all the items on your shopping list, checkout and exit the shop.

When you have finished shopping you will find out whether you managed to stay healthy - remember to wash your hands!

Visit shopperbug.co.uk now to play the game!

Design and Software by Chris Shepherd - CCCU Games Design Student

Artwork by Lannah Marshall - CCCU Admin Staff
